Nevermind I jsut read that, that really was a hell of alkot of moding 
and broke alot of the RPG rules. The first being you posted for a 
factions defenses and such when that is not allowed. You can make 
things from a base pop up and fire at your char. Next the Alliance 
base or the Infecticon base would have detected Mustex long before he 
got on the island. Having your one bot single hadndidly dismantel the 
Alliance base is heavy godmoding and such. Ugh I wish the council was 
here right now but most of it is gone... Perhaps we should all make a 
temporary council until everyone gets back? Rauq gets back this 
sunbday but alot can happen in one day, such as Kyles post.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Eh? What post was the mass moding.. i didnt read it...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > OOC: Offering my opinion, yes, that was a very high amount of 
> moding. I got my ass handed to me for months because people 
> disrespected me after I did something similar. Your post was very 
> well written, but not fair to the other RPGers...
